hr.fer.zemris.java.gui.charts

Class BarChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.gui.charts.BarChart

  • public class BarChart
extends java.lang.Object

    Holds information about a bar chart bar chart.

    This class is used by BarChartComponent to store the values represented by it. Given XYValue shouldn't have their y component set to below the yMin or they might not be able to be represented by the classes that used this class.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic
    See Also:
    BarChartComponent

      • BarChart

        public BarChart(java.util.List<XYValue> bars,
                java.lang.String xName,
                java.lang.String yName,
                int yMin,
                int yMax,
                int yStep)
        Creates the chart with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        bars - bars to be represented by the chart
        xName - name of the x axis
        yName - name of the y axis
        yMin - minimal value of the y axis
        yMax - maximal value of the y axis
        yStep - y increment value
